DeLT Labs Dev

SQLLRS React

SQLLRS Version 0.7+ supports Reactions.

Tipp:

Tip

Reactions will only be shown in the menu if the enableReactions parameter is set to true.

{
  "lrs" : {
    "adminUserDefault": "",
    "adminPassDefault": "",
    "enableReactions": true
  },
  "webserver":   
}

POST https://localhost:8443/xapi/statements
